Heading.title: Renewal information
Heading.description: Automatic renewal will occur every month and the card associated with your account will be charged. Renewal can be cancelled at any time.

Summary.info_text: By clicking the confirm purchase button, you agree to start with your subscription immediately. To validate your credit card, we will charge you a few cents and refund you immediately afterwards. Onoff will automatically renew your subscription and charge the corresponding fees to your credit card every month unless you cancel. You can cancel your subscription at any time to avoid any further debits.
Summary.title: Summary

Notifications.success_description: Hooray! Your number is active again. Now you can make calls and send messages.
Notifications.error_description_general: Unfortunately, something went wrong. Please check your credit card details and try again. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact our support team.

Notifications.error_description_pd_restricted_card: A restriction is placed on your card and we can't process the payment at the moment. Please contact your bank or use a different card

Features.description_webapp_access: Make & receive calls, send & receive SMS via Web App.
Features.description_limits_calls_sms: Calling much? Enjoy higher calling and SMS capacity per month
Features.description_multi_device_support: Access your number from any smartphone, laptop or tablet.
Features.description_onoff_calls: GSM call quality without internet connection in mobile app. Receive calls directly to your SIM.
Features.description_call_notes: Take and save notes during your calls (iOS and Android coming soon).
Features.description_private_mode: Hide your number and Onoff contacts quickly to keep your privacy.
Features.description_sms_scheduling: Schedule your SMS to be sent in any date & time you choose.
Features.description_calls_over_internet: You don’t have to use your SIM plan for your outgoing calls.
Features.description_voicemail_transcription: Choose to read or listen to your voicemails on iOS.
Features.description_multi_lang_voicemail: Record your voicemail greeting in the language of your choice (FR, EN, PT, AR).

Info.title: Premium
Info.description: Get premium now and enjoy all these features for all of your Onoff numbers.

Upgrade.title: Go Premium
Upgrade.description: Take advantage of all Premium features with all of your numbers by upgrading to Premium.
Upgrade.footer_title: One subscription for all of your numbers

Trial.title: Start Premium Free Trial
Trial.description: Upgrade your account to Premium, and get access to advanced features with the Premium Plan for all your numbers.
Trial.info_box: Enjoy a free premium trial to explore advanced features without commitment. After the trial period, the subscription fee will be automatically charged to your account. You can manage or cancel your subscription at any time through the settings on our web application.

ExportContactModal.title: Export contact to CRM
ExportContactModal.description: I agree to the {button} and authorize creating a contact in the integrated app.

ErrorToast.title: Oops, something went wrong
ErrorToast.description: An error occurred while exporting your contact. Try again!

ExportContactModal.disclaimer_content: Under the General Data Protection Regulation UE 2016/679, you are considered as a Data Controller of your Contact files. Such file is considered as Personal Data. Accordingly, when you process and/or export a file with a Personal data content to a third part application, OnOff Telecom is not responsible anymore for the use and the processing of the file by you and the recipient. As a result, you assume all responsibility on the file as a Data Controller pursuant to Regulation UE 2016/679, including the fact that you have a lawful basis for processing such file, and sufficient security measures to protect the file.

Please switch to the associated tab or {buttonText} to make this tab active again. Please note that if you have an ongoing call in another tab, it may be affected when you switch to this tab.
